title: Boards Background
body: The boards background looks like an awesome idea for a new side map, like a dominion replacement. I know they're still working out the kinks of the new summoners rift but the background looks too cool to not make into something map like. Thoughts?

replies.body: TOO BAD IF IT IS A DOMINION REPLACEMENT WE DON'T GET IT!

We might if it gets good feedback from the the pbe. The only reason dominion was removed was because not a lot of new players played it but with a new map I'd think it could make a comeback, doesn't have to have the same rules and game-type as the crystal scar but something similar could be good
True actually. I wouldn't mind seeing a reworked dominion and would like to play it with proper matchmaking. Even if it is like the old teambuilder - one day a week :P
is the background not a "realistic" summoners rift base? 2 Nexus towers on the left and a couple inhibs in the foregound

Yes apart from the long bridges, its more like another type of summoners rift instead of it being a forest separated by a river its like a giant abandoned ruin. I'd think an abandoned ruin would be a cool place to 5v5
